name: Jump to the circle
description:
While playing "Jump to the circle" you will find a really funny gameplay with challeging gameplay and a random generated levels.

In this game you will control an arrow that spins around circles that are across the levels. The circles are also surrounded by some "gears" that destroy your arrow with the minimal touch.
The gameplay advances vertically, between two walls, so the "gameplay space" is narrow and short.


What to expect:

-Minimalist style that fits perfect with the game style.

-Challeging gameplay.

-Random generated levels.

How to play:

-Left mouse click to jump with the arrow.
